content: min kärlek babypants over the years i ve knitted many pants for the babies of friends and family roughly based on martina behm s „pepita pattern i knitted pants in two sizes for my little son during pregnancy but forgot to write down how exactly i did it so when another pair was needed i kept writing down every single step during the knitting process so that other knitters can use my notes for their own projects yarn wollmeise twin or other abbreviations fingering weight yarn approx 120g for main colour and 30g for bobble bind off contrast colour cc contrast colour co cast on needles 2 5mm for ribbing k knit 2 75mm for stockinette parts kfb knit front and back increase one stitch gauge 30 sts 46 row = 10 cm² mc main colour in stockinette stitch m1 make one increase one stitch size 0-3 months 3-6 months p purl pm place marker sts stitches st st stockinette stitch w&t wrap and turn jagheteralice min kärlek babypants puenktchen on ravelry 1 this pattern is for free - feel free to knit this as often as you like don t copy or sell waistband co 120 sts 136 sts in mc on size 2 5 needle join for working in the round and place marker work in k2p2-ribbing for 20 25 rounds next row work 6 8 eyelets for the i-cord/waistband 0-3 months work 8 sts in pattern yo k2tog work 18 sts in pattern yo k2tog 5 times work 8 sts in pattern 3-6 months work 6 sts in pattern yo p2tog work 14 sts in pattern yo p2tog work 18 sts in pattern yo p2tog work 14 sts in pattern yo p2tog 3 times work 18 sts in pattern yo p2tog work 14 sts in pattern yo p2tog work 8 sts in pattern k2p2 for another 10 19 rounds jagheteralice min kärlek babypants puenktchen on ravelry 2 this pattern is for free - feel free to knit this as often as you like don t copy or sell start working short-row work 29 33 sts in pattern w&t turn work work back to marker in pattern on wrong side slip marker work 29 33 sts in pattern w&t work in pattern until you reach the w&t knit wrapped stitch together with the wrap p2 k1 w&t 4 times work in pattern to marker slip marker k2p2 for one round knitting the wraps together with the wrapped sts body and crotch change to needlesize 2 75 round 1 k 10 m1 k 17 m1 - repeat to end of round 132 sts 144sts round 2 knit one round round 3 k11 m1 k12 m1 repeat to end of round 144 sts 156 sts change to cc keep on knitting 3 rounds in mc and 2 rounds in cc round 4 knit one round round 5 k36 m1 k39 m1 repeat to end of round 148 sts 160 sts keep on working stockinette stitch for another 36 41 rounds
